job title: Call For Consultancy – Assessment tool of climate risks for municipalities in Laos and Cambodia
position: Call For Consultancy – Assessment tool of climate risks for municipalities in Laos and Cambodia
Job Description:
Objectives
The consultant shall develop a tool to assess climate risks in secondary and tertiary towns on Laos PDR and Cambodia. The assessment tool shall be applied independently by the various municipalities and assess potential climate risks and their likelihood or occurrence. In addition, the tool shall include guidance on how to prioritize activities for climate risk adaptation & mitigation as well as a simple improvement / work plan.

* Scope of Work
1. Develop a comprehensive assessment tool to guide municipalities in Laos PDR and Cambodia in assessing climate risks (such as flooding, droughts, landslides, contamination of groundwater resources through heavy rainwater events etc.):
- Development of a risk assessment matrix for climate related risks
- Provide a workshop guideline to map those risks and identify hot spot locations
- Development of an evaluation matrix to prioritize activities related to adaptation and mitigation
- Development of a simple work plan / incremental improvement plan
- Development of a simple monitoring sheet to assess progress of improvement activities

2. Prepare a guideline on how to apply the developed risks assessment tool 
Note: The assessment tool is intended to be applied independently by the various municipalities. The tool shall be practical, and the guideline written in a concise and understandable manner.

* Deliverables
1. Assessment matrices in word and .pdf file
2. Work / incremental improvement plan to be delivered in word and excel format
3. Guidelines can be provided via a PowerPoint file
4. Short summary on project climate scenarios of Laos and Cambodia, as introduction and part of the workshop / assessment guidelines
- All deliverables are expected in English language.
- All deliverables shall be produced in such a way that each single word can be translated in other languages later.
Job Requirement:
* Timeline
The consultancy is expected to be completed within 10 weeks of the start date.

* Budget
- The max. budget for this consultancy should not be more than 5000 USD.
- The consultancy can be delivered remotely so no budget for travel would be required.

* Qualifications
The consultant shall have a track record in developing climate risk assessment tool, and preferably experience in dealing with municipalities / towns in Asia.

* Reporting
The consultant shall provide regular progress reports to the project team. The reporting format and frequency will be agreed upon at the start of the consultancy. Additionally, the consultant shall submit the deliverables outlined above as per the agreed timeline.

job title: Call For Consultancy – Guidebook on water sensitive and climate resilient infrastructure solutions for municipalities in Laos and Cambodia
position: Call For Consultancy – Guidebook on water sensitive and climate resilient infrastructure solutions for municipalities in Laos and Cambodia
Job Description:
Objectives
The consultant shall develop a guidebook for water sensitive infrastructure solutions to improve the climate resilience of secondary and tertiary cities in Laos PDR and Cambodia. The guidebook shall display a selection of practical & water sensitive solutions to protect against climate risks, such as flooding, heavy rainwater events as well as droughts. The nature of the infrastructure’s solutions shall be low maintenance, require no electricity, can be built with locally available material, enhance livability of the city, promote inclusiveness. The solutions can be additional infrastructure or modify existing once and upgrade them to water sensitive and climate resilient solutions.

* Scope of Work
1. Conduct desk study, interviews with BORDA staff and other project related individuals as well as a field visit to at least 2 cities of each project country of Laos and Cambodia (e.g. Kratie, Kampot, Chbar Mon in Cambodia and Sam Neua, Vieng Xai, Houa Mueang in Laos PDR), assessing actual
climate risks, and occurring damages caused by climate change and urban planning failures.
2. Identify existing waters sensitive solutions applied by the respective towns and potential new water sensitive solutions, which could be integrated in the respective city contexts
3. Development of a guidebook summarizing the existing and new infrastructure solutions to enhance the water sensitivity and climate resilience of secondary and tertiary towns
4. Develop appealing drawings as main feature of the guidebook to display the respective infrastructure solutions. Additionally, the drawing shall be complemented by providing information on: specific costs, pros & cons, and potentially basic construction guidelines

Note: The suggested infrastructure solutions shall be related to urban water management solutions, and ideally transfer new and innovative infrastructure solutions to e.g., mitigate flood events, recharge groundwater, manage/collect rainwater. Infrastructure solutions such as swales, planted drainage systems, ground infiltrations or rainwater storage solutions using public spaces such as school yards or sidewalks, flood protection walls etc. could be potential solutions among others

* Deliverables
1. Short baseline assessment report on actual impacts on the cities caused due to climate change / weather extremes
2. Short report on existing water sensitive solutions and potentially new solutions which could improve climate resilience, livability as well as the overall management of urban waters
3. Guidebook, with drawings, pro´s and cons, construction details

- All deliverables are expected in English language.
- All deliverables shall be produced in such a way that each single word can be translated in other languages later.
Job Requirement:

The consultancy is expected to be completed within max. 12 weeks of the start date.

* Budget
- The max. budget for this consultancy should not be more than 40.000 USD.
- The consultancy budget shall include all travel and lodging costs for the consultant.

* Qualifications
The consultant shall have a track record in water sensitive urban planning approaches, infrastructure development, as well as the production of drawings.
